author: rhs
msg: added back the stripped version of qpid-errata

author: rpopma
msg: prevent NPE in ShutdownHook thread if disruptor was already shut down; added credit to Steven Yang for pointing out the original issue

author: olegk
msg: Non-blocking connection pool to avoid scanning the entire queue of pending connection requests on each connection lease / release operation (under heavy load the request queue can contain a significant number of pending requests, a full linear scan of which can cause massive performance degradation)
